participant_1.background:
I just took my dirty laundry out of the hamper.
i work at the grocery store.
i have braces.
i am a mom with two sons and a husband.
I want a home where I can entertain my friends and play my Lindsey Stirling albums loud.

participant_2.background:
I have no children, but I love my pets very much.
I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income.
i love to run fast.
i play video games all day.
I am a person who is happy with my hobbies and I am not too concerned about what others think of me.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you! How are you?
I am doing well too, thank you. I am a mom with two sons and a husband. I work at the grocery store. I just took my dirty laundry out of the hamper.

That sounds like a busy life! I have no children, but I love my pets very much. I am worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income. I love to run fast and play video games all day. I am a person who is happy with my hobbies and I am not too concerned about what others think of me.

It is a busy life, but it is also a very rewarding one. I love my family very much. I am sorry to hear that you are worried about making ends meet. I hope that things get better for you soon. I love running too! I used to run track in high school. I do not run as much as I used to, but I still enjoy it when I get the chance.

Thank you! I am trying to stay positive. I know that things will get better eventually. I am glad to hear that you used to run track. That is awesome! I love video games so much. I play them every day. I am not sure what I would do without them.
I agree! Video games are a great way to relax and have fun. I also love to play them. I am glad that you have a hobby that you enjoy so much.
Thank you! I am glad too. I do not have a lot of friends, so my hobbies are very important to me.
I am sorry to hear that you do not have many friends. I am happy to be your friend, if you want.
Thank you! I would love to be your friend.
Great! I am glad to hear that.
